---
title: "RNA-seq Differential Expression (Mock)"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(DESeq2)
counts <- read.table("../data/mock_counts.txt", header=TRUE, row.names=1)
condition <- factor(c("case", "control"))
colData <- data.frame(row.names=colnames(counts), condition)
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData=counts, colData=colData, design=~condition)
dds <- DESeq(dds)
res <- results(dds)
plotMA(res)
